name: Weekend solitaire: Summer village
description: Weekend Solitaire Summer Village dives into a bright world filled with vibrant gameplay, colorful animations, and hours of addictive card-solving fun! Enjoy an exciting journey through 130 levels of various complexities, each presenting a unique challenge that will put your solitaire skills to the test. Get ready to unwind and bask in the joys of summer with Weekend Solitaire Summer Village!
